abstract: Top news from the regional press this week.
snippet: Top news from the regional press this week.
lead_paragraph: Jammu and Kashmir: An uncensored video clip of two senior leaders hurling abuses at each other in the Jammu and Kashmir Assembly on Monday has gone viral in the Valley.  The 141-second long clip, in Kasmiri, of the bitter exchange between Assembly Speaker Mohammad Akbar Lone and members of the opposition party MLA, has been featured on hundreds of Facebook pages. (Kashmir Live)Haryana: The local administration in the Karnal district of Haryana launched a Facebook campaign to protect females. The impetus behind the drive is to raise youth awareness about the social fallout of a skewed sex ratio. (The Tribune)
